com.schibsted.android.sdk.request
Class SPiDRequest

java.lang.Object
  android.os.AsyncTask<java.lang.Void,java.lang.Void,SPiDResponse>
      com.schibsted.android.sdk.request.SPiDRequest
Direct Known Subclasses:
SPiDApiGetRequest, SPiDApiPostRequest, SPiDTokenRequest
public class SPiDRequest
extends android.os.AsyncTask<java.lang.Void,java.lang.Void,SPiDResponse>

Contains a request to SPiD, note that each request can only be used once since it extends AsyncTask
